mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Resume Architect, we're dedicated to empowering job seekers with the tools they need to create outstanding resumes. Our mission is to simplify the resume-building process while providing professional, tailored results that help our users stand out in today's competitive job market.

community.title: Our Growing Community
community.description: Join thousands of satisfied users who have successfully created and optimized their resumes using Resume Architect. Our community is constantly growing, and we're committed to continually improving our platform based on user feedback and industry trends.

features.title: Key Features
features.secureStorage: Secure cloud storage for your resumes
